snippet: Sony Music has released a very limited album of early Bob Dylan recordings to retain its copyright on them under the provisions of a new European law.
abstract: Sony Music releases a very limited album of early Bob Dylan recordings to retain its copyright on them under provisions of a new European law, which extends copyright to 70 years only if artist publishes works before Europe's original 50-year term expires.
lead_paragraph: Sony Music has released a very limited album of early Bob Dylan recordings to retain its copyright on them under the provisions of a new European law.

headline.seo: Sony Issues Bob Dylan Recordings to Keep European Copyright
headline.main: Sony Issues Dylan CDs to Extend Copyright
headline.print_headline: Sony Issues Dylan CDs To Extend Copyright
